description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing global application state related to team information, quiz responses, saved activities, and feedback in a frontend project.

methods.name: setTeam
methods.description: Updates the team state with provided team data.

methods.name: setQuiz
methods.description: Updates the quiz state with provided quiz data.

methods.name: saveRecommendation
methods.description: Adds a new recommendation item to the saved list if it does not already exist.

methods.name: giveFeedback
methods.description: Appends new feedback to the feedback list, generating a unique id for each.

methods.name: clearRecommendations
methods.description: Clears all recommendations; placeholder implementation that resets state.

methods.name: setPlan
methods.description: Updates the plan state with provided plan data.
